title: Oven Beef Stew
directions: In a resealable plastic bag, combine the flour, salt and pepper. Add beef cubes, a few at a time, and shake to coat. In a Dutch oven, brown meat in oil. Add the soup, water, onion and basil; mix well. Cover and bake at 350Â° for 1 hour. Add potatoes and carrots. Bake 1 hour longer or until meat and vegetables are tender.
ingredients: 3/4 pound boneless beef chuck roast, cut into 1-inch cubes
1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed tomato soup, undiluted
